title_advert: ['Stunning Studios with Breathtaking Views of Ajman']
amenities:
['Unfurnished
Central A/C
Covered Parking
Lobby in Building

Shared Pool
Shared Spa
View of Landmark
View of Water']
descriptions:
['DescriptionOrient Towers is a luxurious residential complex development consisting of four mid-rise residential towers connected with podium level, located in one of the Ajman’s most popular residential community "Al Bustan", overlooking to the Ajman Creek and minutes away to Ajman Corniche Road, Ajman Harbor, and the Ajman Heritage City, this unique and strategic location offers the residents a lifestyle that celebrates the modern spirit of family living. 
Each tower offers varied options of apartments that have been designed to satisfy all modern lifestyle that you deserve, ranging from studio, one, two and three-bedroom units, most of them have breathtaking and scenic views of the creek as well as a vista of adjoining landscaped area.
The project presenting the perfect balance of entertainment, work and community living, with significant location very close to Ajman Corniche, in the heart of Ajman city you will find everything in the surrounding areas; Hospitals, Banks, Clinics, Hotels, Cafes, Schools, restaurants and all you need to extra-ordinate your life style.
About the developer:
Aqaar is a Government Public Corporation, founded in 2016 by an Emiri Decree No. (9) from the vision of His Highness Sheikh Humaid bin Rashid Al Nuami Supreme Council Member and Ruler of Ajman.']

Olga Novikova (consultant)
*****************************************

['DescriptionSunshine Homes Real Estate brings to you an exclusive beachfront property on Jumeirah Bay Island. This project is set to become the most sought-after address in Dubai with luxurious residences and breath-taking sea views. The seahorse-shaped multi-use island development by Meraas will feature an array of residential buildings and villas accompanied by green spaces and stunning panoramic views of the sea and the Dubai skyline. With the iconic Bulgari Resort & Residences nearing completion which will include a 5-star hotel, residential villas and apartments, a yacht club, a marina, and an array of leisure facilities, Jumeirah Bay is soon to be a luxurious destination. \nThe 17,459 sq ft plot for sale is one of only 128 land plots on the island and enjoys a prime location with private beach access and stunning ocean and skyline views. Residents and visitors have access to the island through a bridge off the vibrant Jumeirah Beach Road. Contact us today for your private viewing of this extraordinary property.']
